channel.title: Need some "complex" coding help :P
channel.description:
Ok, so its not that complex, but I am pretty stupid. I just started on pretty much a blank source and need 2 things
1: I was adding shops, but where it says [code]//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item-[/code] I dont know what to put under sell and buy. If you kno please tell me.
2: if someone can tell me how to make a webclient that would be great to, I found a ASP web host, but dont know how to work it. so if there are any tuts i greatly appreciate it.
thanks

item.title: Need some "complex" coding help :P
item.dc:creator: @jb_blaze jb blaze
item.description:
@jb_blaze wrote:

lol thanks, i have been googling forever about webclient, all i found was this

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1101.0.html

wich doesnt work apperently.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2008, 06:03:14 am[/size][hr]and what do you mean?

1. put the sell and buy type. i forget what is what.

that mean you dont know what to put there, or should I put type under there? please explain
